alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Developing strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southeastern Gadsden, northwestern Jefferson and Leon Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 448 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms developing along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Midway to 6 miles northeast of Woodville. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Florida State University, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Cody, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Griffin Heights, Drifton, Tallahassee Regional A/P and Governors Square Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
